channel.title: CVE Feed for swiftylife -- Swifty Page Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for swiftylife -- Swifty Page Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-0088|2023-01-05T18:15:34.743Z -- swiftylife -- swifty%20page%20manager
item.description: The Swifty Page Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 3.0.1. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on several AJAX actions handling page creation and deletion among other things. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to invoke those functions, via forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
